meanings.definition: A person or thing that emerges.
meanings.sent1: The tiny plant was an emergents in the garden, just starting to grow.
meanings.sent2: The emergents from the water caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent3: The emergents in the race was a turtle wearing a cape!
meanings.sent4: The emergents of the sun over the horizon was like a golden dragon awakening.
meanings.sent5: The emergents of the butterfly from its chrysalis was a magical moment.

meanings.definition: A new trend or movement in a particular field.
meanings.sent1: The emergents of online shopping changed the way people buy things.
meanings.sent2: The emergents of electric cars is helping the environment.
meanings.sent3: The emergents of wearing socks with sandals is quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: The emergents of social media was like a wildfire spreading across the world.
meanings.sent5: The emergents of the fashion trend was bold and eye-catching.
